subproject.description:
As of today, 3 Border outposts were fully refurbished and one new built. 
Up to 130 Border Staff received improved living conditions.  Kitchen/shower/ toilet facilities were built as well as kitchen equipment and furniture provided.
subproject.title: Tajik-Afghan Border Security

subproject.corporate outcome: National, regional and local levels of governance expand their capacities to manage the equitable delivery of public services
